verbs.description: Organizers for the Paralympic Games [V: have] responded to President Trump after he seemed to voice his discomfort while watching athletes with disabilities .

Organizers for the Paralympic Games have responded to President Trump after [ARG1: he] [V: seemed] [C-ARG1: to voice his discomfort while watching athletes with disabilities] .
Organizers for the Paralympic Games have responded to President Trump after [ARG0: he] seemed to [V: voice] [ARG1: his discomfort] [ARGM-TMP: while watching athletes with disabilities] .
Organizers for the Paralympic Games have responded to President Trump after [ARG0: he] seemed to voice his discomfort while [V: watching] [ARG1: athletes with disabilities] .
